name: Fast Burguer Restaurant
description:
This is a newly remastered version with cool old times music!

You can play the HTML5 version on your browser for free: PLAY HERE!

FastBurguer is not an ordinary cooking game... it is actually a simple Simulation where you have total control to manage where, when and how you cook or put the ingredients before delivering your order.

But watch out! Each ingredient haves its own behavior, ideal cooking time and also looses temperature if you let it waiting too much on the table or serving tray...

So, you must coordinate your kitchen like a real Chef to deliver hot food and get a higher score!

And don't let anything burn!

This new version also features a Free-Play mode where you can cook what you want, but you can also try the challenge to cook one of each burger in FastBurguerRestaurant's menu and see if you are accepted to work there!

Below you can Download the Android APK version to play on your phone.

Also, check out these other projects from Maloke Games!
